programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Get to know one extraordinary person who works on the show as we go fishing with underwater cameraman and boat captain himself, Garrett Stephens.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Jared Dieguz has been fishing all his life and now that he's running his own charter business, finding a day to "scout" the sea is more important than ever.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Water quality is everything—and the Star brite - SeaSafe team is back at it for the second year in a row! Led by Cory Redwine, Conservation Director of Project SeaSafe, this is the 4th Annual Clean Water Collective and it’s bigger than ever. This time, we’re in Grant, Florida, where 4 million clams are being released into the Indian River Lagoon, paired with the planting of thousands of mangroves, oyster work by CCA and trash clean ups to help restore one of Florida’s most critical ecosystems. But it’s not just about hard work—it’s about connection. With local captains, fishing legends, and the Local Knowledge crew on hand, we hit the water to show why this place is worth fighting for. From clam drops by drone, to in-water mangrove planting, to monster snook catches, this is hands-on conservation at its best. This two-part series kicks off with action, heart, and the kind of hope only a healthy waterway can bring. Don’t miss Part 1—where conservation meets community and everyone gets their hands wet.

programme.title: Local Knowledge How To's
programme.desc: Adrian Martinez from Handler Fishing Supply in Merrit Island Florida shows Rush how they build their deep drop fishing rigs for catching tile fish and snowy grouper.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: After a great trip fishing the flats, Rush returns the favor and extends an invite to friend Jarred Cyr fishing offshore. Fishing in Key West is all about the variety of species and opportunities they present. Mixing it up and taking advantage of this, the guys decide to see how many species they can catch using light spin and fly tackle offshore.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Charlie Scoble & Donnie Lang on a mother ship trip aboard the “TACKLE CENTER” to the Dry Tortugas Part 2.

programme.desc: No, we aren’t talking about a hair dew. Danny hangs out with some amazing people that commercial fish for Florida gold.

programme.title: Sportsman's Journal
programme.desc: Tyler and Sara spend the last night of the year on the ice chasing crappies after dark!

programme.title: Global Getaway
programme.desc: This week on Getaway, David Genat is cruising the Caribbean through the US and British Virgin Islands before finishing up in colorful and vibrant Puerto Rico.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Retired army nurse Linda Powel wins a dream hunt in Texas hosted by Record Rack Deer feed. What's the catch? Linda has never hunted a day in her life!

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: David Gilane chronicles the last couple of years of him going down to Texas and chasing exotic axis deer.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Team members Dan and Brad head to the lush spring landscapes of Wisconsin, aiming to double up on some elusive spring turkeys.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier joins Capt. Brian Sawyer on an exhilarating pursuit of Silver Kings prowling the waters of Homosassa.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier teams up with Capt. David Paycheck for a day of firsts. Jason tries a new style of bass fishing with David, and then introduces David to hunting Moorhen for the first time.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: In this episode, Jason Dozier teams up with his longtime friend, Capt. Danny, for an exciting fishing adventure in Tampa Bay. Reuniting on the water for the first time in over a decade, they're looking forward to making memories, enjoying the day, and maybe even reeling in a fresh catch for dinner.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Swordfishing out of Plantation Boat Mart"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger take Plantation Boat Mart’s new 36’ Invincible out to the swordfish grounds.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Palm Beach in the new Invincible Catamaran"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger break in their new Invincible Catamaran with a trip to fish out of Palm Beach with their friend Captain Dave Fields.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger fly kites with Captain Dave Fields for a great day of sailfishing out of Sailfish Marina in Palm Beach.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Way Out in the Gulf Part 1"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger take a long run out into the Gulf from Key West to sample the bottom fishing and the long range capability of their new Invincible Catamaran.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Way Out in the Gulf Part 2"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger continue fishing after taking a long run out into the Gulf from Key West to sample the bottom fishing and the long range capability of their new Invincible Catamaran.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Chasing Pelagics in Big Seas Out of Key West"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger fish out of Key West for tunas and sailfish while battling big seas and big sharks.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: There is a place in Florida that not many people have heard about. The Forgotten Coast, Ever heard of it? Didn’t think so. Let’s discover it together.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: No, we aren’t talking about a hair dew. Danny hangs out with some amazing people that commercial fish for Florida gold.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny finds himself on an island in the heart of St. Joseph’s Bay on Black’s Island in search of fish, food and a good time

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: A once thriving area for wild oysters finds itself in need of rehabilitation. Danny visits a new oyster farm dedicated to building a healthy oyster population.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: Spring Thunder - "Sunshine State Redemption Gobblers | Florida Longbeard Down | Spring Thunder"
programme.desc: Phillip Culpepper is back, and he and the crew chase wild turkeys in the Sunshine State. Obviously, Spring Thunder is rolling in full force, and this week, we join the crew down south in Florida. Conditions are rough, but the guys stay after it and close the distance.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: Spring Thunder - "7-Day Slam: A Louisiana Home Farm Bird (First One in 60 Years) | Spring Thunder"
programme.desc: With one farm flooded, the crew heads to northern Luisiana to try and punch a tag on a Louisiana Eastern. The boys get eyes on a group of birds and put them to roost. The next morning, they set up in hopes of catching them at fly down.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "Two Gobblers Down! | Phillip Culpepper Hunts Mississippi Opener"
programme.desc: Turkey season is officially in full swing. Phillip Culpepper heads to Mississippi to meet up with old friends and hunt the season opener. After scouting up a flock of turkeys the day before, Culpepper sets up the next morning and works a longbeard right into the decoys. Shortly after, producer Matt Garger buys his license and is up-to-bat.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "Strutters At 10 Yards | First Georgia Gobbler Of The Year Down"
programme.desc: David Blanton heads to southern Georgia to kick off the 2023 Georgia youth turkey season. The turkeys are fired up, but so is Addox Hollingsworth.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: David Blanton hunts with long-time friend, Richard Reid, in Mississippi. Then, he takes on the tough task of self-filming a turkey hunt. Will he succeed and fill a turkey tag on camera? Let's find out.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: All Thing Hunting's Cole Barthel hunts some of the toughest birds in the Union in his home state of Louisiana. He is joined by friend and turkey hunting freak Tommy Huggins, and All Things Hunting's Kyle Barefield.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. Mike teaches the guys about the local waters including pogey boats and most importantly, world class red fish.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton goes down North Carolina to learn the family secrets of the Forehand family. Ben Forehand is a guitarist for Christian Contemporary artist Pat Barret. When Ben isn’t playing guitar, he runs Wild and Free Outfitters getting people into the outdoors hunting and fishing, getting their minds off of the everyday grind. . Even though fishing is tough the guys build strong friendships and lasting memories.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA’s skiff gets an upgrade. Now no fish is safe.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Low country BBQ and Redfish? What more do you want?

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA heads to the scenic Low country of South Carolina for part one of an epic two-part redfish adventure.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: The South Carolina redfish mission continues! C.A. and Stephen hunt for redfish in unfamiliar territory.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is joined by his son Dillan for a plug-filled day in their local waters of Cedar Key, FL!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is in Stuart, FL. Joined by 16-year-old angler, Denton Potter. The two are targeting the local bridge dwelling giants, while going “Beyond The Surface” into Denton’s story.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Over a decade after the game changing Longbeard XR was introduced by Winchester, the wait is finally over for their next ground breaking turkey load. After years of perfecting the recipe behind the scenes, Winchester finally unveiled the new Longbeard TSS at a turkey camp in northern Michigan. First watch the jaw dropping Longbeard TSS pattern board testing, then see it go to work on some spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Nestled in the hills of Ohio just west of the Appalachians is a very special deer camp ripe with memories from deer season’s past. With the development of the 350 Legend straight-walled cartridge by Winchester in 2019, a world of opportunities now existed in states like Ohio and Michigan. In this episode, with the 350 Legend in hand, three mature whitetails meet their maker, from the same blind, over the course of three seasons.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: It’s been 60 years since AA was introduced to the shooting sports world. Since that day, an immeasurable number of AA hulls have hit the ground and countless shooters have stood center stage raising a trophy where millions of dollars have been won. Professional and recreational shooters alike have trusted AA for six decades. In this episode, load up for stories of high school, collegiate competitors and the world’s best as they bust clays with the legendary shot shell. - GUESTS: Zach Keenbaum (Team Winchester) Desi Edmunds (Team Winchester) Kayla Wilgus (Team Winchester) Amy Cawley (Team Winchester) Anthony Matarese (Team Winchester)

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: For the first time in history, the World English Sporting Clays Championship was held in the United States at the incredible M&M Hunting Preserve owned by the Matarese family in New Jersey. Watch as Winchester’s best shooters vie for Gold as they compete against over 2,500 shooters and 17 countries. We’ll also join the Kids and Clays foundation in Florida as they host an event that will most certainly touch your soul.
Adam and Logan Hays chase big bucks in the Buckeye State!

programme.title: Global Getaway
programme.sub-title: Getaway - "Scenic Rivers Gems of the Seine 2"
programme.desc: This week on Getaway David Reyne is in France, cruising the Seine River, visiting the somber sites of the D-Day Landings plus the spectacular gardens that inspired Monet.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Rusty Creasey joins the Spring Thunder crew for an incredible turkey hunt in Oklahoma. The guys are blessed to fill 6 tags in a short time and have several memorable hunts.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is joining his good friend, Crystal River local, and big fish master; Capt. Socrates Conomos. The two are in search of whatever swims, as long as it’s big…

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Islamorada Blackfins And Mahis With Capt Scott Stoky"
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve start the season with Capt. Scott Stoky chasing Islamorada Tunas and Mahis offshore out of Plantation Boat Mart.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve catch a mixed bag bottom fishing off of Islamorada with Captain Scott Stoky.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.sub-title: Into The Blue - "Yellowtails And Lemons At Hawks Cay"
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve go yellow tailing out of Hawks Cay for a limit of tasty yellowtail snapper and Steve picks a battle with a big lemon shark.
